name: wwebjs-orchestrator
description: Orchestrator for managing multiple wwebjs-api instances

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.docker:portainer: docker volume create portainer_data && docker run -d -p 9000:9000 -p 8000:8000 --name portainer --restart always -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v portainer_data:/data portainer/portainer-ce:latest
